name: Alveoli Defense
description:
Alveoli Defense is a casual top-down game created in 5 days about immune cell hunting and killing Coronavirus to protect the alveoli from their infection.

In this game, you need to hunt and kill all 150 Coronavirus within 60 seconds to win. Every time you kill 9 of them, the time will reset back to 60 seconds and when you reached a certain score, you'll become a new type of immune cell.

Ability Of Each Immune Cell:

Neutrofil: Create a small trap around it to catch nearby Coronavirus

Macrophage: Fast in movement (Passive Ability)

Killer T Cell: Sprint to move faster

B Cell: Create a bigger trap around it to catch far range Coronavirus

Controls:

(Gamepad Supported)

Move: WASD/UP Down Left Right (Left Thumb Stick/D-Pad)

Action Button: Space Bar/E/F (X/A/B)

Pause: P (Menu Button)

Restart: R (Y)
